in mathlib3 group_with_zero extends monoid_with_zero, div_inv_monoid and nontrivial, whereas in mathlib 4 GroupWithZero extends DivInvMonoid and MonoidWithZero but includes an explicit field exists_pair_ne. I ran into this because there is no Nontrivial instance for GroupWithZero.

It this an oversight in the implementation and it should extend Nontrivial, or should I add the Nontrivial instance separately?
